sentences.sContent: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.sContent: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.sCn: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。
